content: सू {vI.v} {c2c} {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> (सूते, सूयते, सूत) To bring forth, produce, beget, yield (<ab>fig.</ab> also); असूत सा नागवधूपभोग्यं <ls>Ku. 1. 20</ls>; कीर्ति सूते दुष्कृतं या हिनास्ति <ls>U. 5. 31.</ls> --WITH प्र to bring forth, beget, produce. {vII.v} {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> (सुवति) {@--1@} To excite, incite, impel. {@--2@} To remit (as debt).
सू {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Bringing forth, producing, yielding &c. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Birth. {@--2@} A mother.
